CodeExample.Title: Get the Attachment's IsInline property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the Attachment's IsInline property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/groups/<Group.objectId>/CalendarView/<Event.Id>/Attachments/<Attachment.Id>/IsInline HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the //myOrganization/groups//CalendarView//Attachments/ URL to get the Attachment entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the IsInline property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=IsInline query option to the //myOrganization/groups//CalendarView//Attachments/ entity-getting URL to retrieve the IsInline property value
